artist: Artist: Kiki Smith; Printer: Leroy Neiman Center for Print Studies, Columbia University, New York; Publisher: Leroy Neiman Center for Print Studies, Columbia University, New York
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
inscription: Screenprinted inscription in black ink on portfolio cover: \"I see the moon and the moon sees me\"
markings: Publisher\'s logo printed on colophon page, LR
medium: Photogravure on mold-made Hahnemühle paper with attached photolithograph and screenprint on handmade Kizukishi paper; accordion-folded folio
provenance: The artist; [Pace Prints, New York]; sold to MIA, 1998.
signed: Signed, dated in pencil on colophon page: Kiki Smith 1998
title: Tidal
